challenge.description: A crime has taken place and the detective needs your help. The detective gave you the crime scene report, but you somehow lost it. You vaguely remember that the crime was a burglary that occurred sometime on ​Jul 7, 2021​ and that it took place in North Karianeshire City. Start by retrieving the corresponding crime scene report from the police department’s database.

crime_scene_report.report: Security footage shows that there were 2 witnesses. The first witness lives at the last house on Alexis Via. The other named Cordia Koss, lives somewhere on Mike Trail.

dialogs.transcript: I saw the burglary happen, and I recognized the burglar from gym when I was working out on Jul 6, 2021.

I heard the alarms go off and then saw a man run out. He had a gym bag. The membership number on the bag ends with `GQS`. Only platinum members have those bags. The man got into a car with a plate that included `9T5`.
